value:
$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Bah... I can't find the bouquet, much
less tell Roy how I really feel. This is
NOT how I hoped today would go...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|It's too early to give up, Lilina. Focus
on what you can do and the rest will
come naturally.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ララム,ch02_22_Lalum_F_Wedding22,Face|Yeah! We haven't been knocked out
of the tournament yet! So just you
wait, Lord Roy!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Wedding22,Face|I'll...do my best...$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|It seems the ladies are ready and
raring to go. It wouldn't do for us to
fall behind now, would it, Roy?$k$p$nMPID_双界ロイ|Right, Father! I'll give it my all!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MAP_FE06_02,0|$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Roy managed to clinch the win, and
he even found the bouquet... Now
what am I supposed to do?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|Why so glum? We haven't heard
who he's going to choose yet.$k$pI can make a guess as to your
preferred outcome, but only Roy
knows his exact intentions.$k$pAs hard as this may be for you to
hear, you should prepare yourself
in case he chooses someone else.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Yes, you're right... Oh, there he is
now, and with Uncle in tow!$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|Congratulations on your victory, Roy.
Have you thought about who to invite
to the ceremony?$k$p$nMPID_双界ロイ|To be honest, I would rather let that
honor be yours, Father. Please, take
the bouquet.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Wait, what?!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|I intended for you to have it from the
beginning. My victory means a
ceremony for you and Mother.$k$pI thought since we're all here
together... What better time to
reaffirm your vows?$k$p$nMPID_エリウッド|That's very thoughtful of you, but are
you absolutely sure? I know how hard
you worked for this.$k$p$nMPID_双界ロイ|Of course. After all, I'm only here
today because you and Mother once
came together like this.$k$pThis is a gift from a child to his
parents. Now let's go and surprise
Mother with the good news!$k$p$nMPID_エリウッド|Very well. I can't say that I saw this
coming, but I would never refuse
such an earnest request.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|$Fi1500|Roy really does care for his family,
huh? Just one of the many reasons
why I...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|Oh my. Your face is as red as an
apple. Is this what they mean by
"blushing bride," hmm?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Please, Cecilia! This is serious...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|Yes, of course. With so many girls
after Roy's affections, I suppose
you'll have your hands full.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|You're right. I have a long road ahead
of me, but I know where it leads.$k$pI will become a woman eminently
qualified to stand side-by-side with
the future marquess.$k$pIn doing so, I will follow the path that
our fathers in Ostia and Pherae
blazed for our generation.$k$pEven if we—if I don't reach my
desired destination, the journey will
have still been well worth it.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|Wise words, Lilina. You know, I may
have to take a more proactive
approach...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|I'm not sure I follow...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Wedding22,Face|I imagine the ceremony is starting
soon. Come, we must see what
his mother chooses to wear!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Oh. Right!$k$p$Sbs150|
